#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define gc getchar_unlocked
inline void inp(int *n )
{
*n=0;
int ch=gc();int sign=1;
while( ch < '0' || ch > '9' ){if(ch=='-')sign=-1; ch=gc();}
while( ch >= '0' && ch <= '9' )
*n = (*n<<3)+(*n<<1) + ch-'0', ch=gc();
*n=*n*sign;
}
using namespace std;
int val[30];
int po=1;
 void fill()
 {
     val[1]=3;
     for(int i=2;i<=26;i++)
     {
       val[i]=val[i-1]+ po*2+1;
       po*=2;
     }
 }
int main()
{
    int t,n,i,j;
    inp(&t);
    fill();
    while(t--)
    {
      inp(&n);
      for(i=0;i<26;i++)
      {
          if(val[i]>n) break;
      }
      i--;
      int d=val[i] + pow(2,i) -1;

      int flag=0;

      int com=val[i];

      if((n-com)%2!=0) printf("NO\n");
      else if(n<d)
      {
          flag=(n-com)/2;
          if(flag%2!=0) printf("RIGHT\n");
          else printf("LEFT\n");
      }
      else printf("NO\n");
    }
 return 0;
}
